p: However, compounds 23 and 24 have a common methanethiol group on the phenyl ring with different meta and para positions. Compound 11 was observed in making good interactions with active-site residues Glu233, Trp59, and leu162 ( Figure 8 d). Compound 23 shows higher activity (IC 50 = 2.15 ± 0.09 μM) than compound 24. It may due to the para position of the methanethiol group, which is the activating group.
